H0.text: What did US state Rhode Island outlaw after 29 years of decriminalization. Prostitution

H1.text: What did US state Rhode Island outlaw after 29 years of decriminalization. Marijuana

H2.text: What did US state Rhode Island outlaw after 29 years of decriminalization. Gambling

H3.text: What did US state Rhode Island outlaw after 29 years of decriminalization. Bawd

A4.text: Prostitution in Rhode Island was outlawed on November 3, 2009 when Republican Governor Donald Carcieri signed into law a bill which makes the buying and selling of sexual services a crime.
